trigger.expression: {Template Apache:apache.BusyWorkers.nodata(5m)}=1 | {Template Apache:apache.BytesPerReq.nodata(5m)}=1 | {Template Apache:apache.BytesPerSec.nodata(5m)}=1 | {Template Apache:apache.Closingconnection.nodata(5m)}=1 | {Template Apache:apache.CPULoad.nodata(5m)}=1 | {Template Apache:apache.DNSLookup.nodata(5m)}=1 | {Template Apache:apache.Gracefullyfinishing.nodata(5m)}=1 | {Template Apache:apache.Idlecleanupofworker.nodata(5m)}=1 | {Template Apache:apache.IdleWorkers.nodata(5m)}=1 | {Template Apache:apache.Keepaliveread.nodata(5m)}=1 | {Template Apache:apache.Logging.nodata(5m)}=1 | {Template Apache:apache.Openslotwithnocurrentprocess.nodata(5m)}=1 | {Template Apache:apache.ReadingRequest.nodata(5m)}=1 | {Template Apache:apache.ReqPerSec.nodata(5m)}=1 | {Template Apache:apache.SendingReply.nodata(5m)}=1 | {Template Apache:apache.Startingup.nodata(5m)}=1 | {Template Apache:apache.TotalAccesses.nodata(5m)}=1 | {Template Apache:apache.TotalkBytes.nodata(5m)}=1 | {Template Apache:apache.Uptime.nodata(5m)}=1 | {Template Apache:apache.WaitingforConnection.nodata(5m)}=1
trigger.name: No data from Apache Monitoring Script for 5 minutes
Remaining Worker Slots < 20%
trigger.description: Rever parametros MaxCLients e ServerLimit do apache.

trigger.name: Worker Slots Exausted (<1%)
trigger.description: Ao acabar os worker slots os usuários começam a ter um delay maior (forma-se uma fila no apache). Rever parametros MaxCLients e ServerLimit do apache.
